name: Fremont
description:
fremont by katie moses

a game about depression, and the way mental health is treated.

this game isn't perfect, this game isn't a masterpiece. its a game created out of an event that was used as a coping mechanism. it was a difficult game to make, and can be challenging to sit through. but it's an important one.

trigger warning for depression, anxiety, and suicide.

made using Twine 2.2.1. created for CMPM 80k, or Foundations of Video Game Design, at University of California, Santa Cruz during Winter 2019.
